data.benefits: The scheme provides financial assistance of up to 75% of project cost (max Rs. 5000 lakhs) for land purchase, factory construction, machinery, and energy-efficient projects.
data.eligibility: All MSME units setting up new units/greenfield projects are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. Promotors contribution would be minimum 25%. 
  2. Applicant should not default from any Bank/Fis For loan above Rs. 2000 lakh, promoter’s experience of 5 years in similar line of business. 
  3. For loan upto Rs. 2000 lakh, promoter’s experience of 3 years in similar line of business.
data.beneficiaries: All MSME units setting up new units/greenfield projects are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. Promotors contribution would be minimum 25%. 
  2. Applicant should not default from any Bank/Fis For loan above Rs. 2000 lakh, promoter’s experience of 5 years in similar line of business. 
  3. For loan upto Rs. 2000 lakh, promoter’s experience of 3 years in similar line of business.
data.nodal_agency: Small Industries Development Bank of India (SIDBI)
data.context: This scheme is introduced for Purchase of capital Assets in New Enterprises (STHAPAN) to promote and assist MSMEs belonging to sunrise sectors and other important sectors.
data.objective: The main aim is to provide financial assistance to new entities or Greenfield projects for setting up of new units.
data.description:
1. Financing upto Rs. 50000 lakhs subject to maximum of 75% of the project cost. 
  2. Promotors Contribution - minimum 25%. MCLR Linked attractive rate of Interest. 
  3. Repayment upto 7 years including moratorium for 2 years.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can directly apply through online portal - https://onlineloanappl.sidbi.in/OnlineApplication/
data.funding_facilitator: Small Industries Development Bank of India (SIDBI)
data.funding_mechanism: Funds will be disbursed by SIDBI successful sanction and completion of requisite documents.
data.additional_info: Loan for purchase of land & construction of factory building, purchase of plant & machinery, miscellaneous fixed assets, installation of rooftop solar projects, acquisition of other energy efficiency devices etc.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Signed copy of Application form 
2. Self-Attested Copy of Udyam Registration (if applicable) 
3. Self-Attested Copy of the Constitution of the enterprise 
4. Self-Attested Copy of PAN Card of Enterprise 
5. Self-Attested Copy of GST Registration (if applicable) 
6. Copy of ITR of the last financial year (if applicable) 
7. Any Other KYC Documents (if required)
